entry.title: If I Never Told You (I Love You)
entry.summary:
Author: astroglowy13

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,593Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 38

Summary: His lips are softer than Eddie would have thought. He can feel the scruff of his face, the hair poking back out after having not been shaved in almost 24hours. He brings his hand up to cradle his cheek and runs his thumb over it, resting his other hand on Buck‚Äôs hip. He pushes slightly deeper into the kiss, wanting to bury himself in Buck. Convince himself that the man is ok. And it feels good. Better than any kiss Eddie has ever had. Better than any kiss has any right to feel. It feels right. And then Eddie realizes what he‚Äôs doing. And Eddie panics. He pulls away so fast, Buck almost seeming to follow him, as if searching for the connection again. Which can‚Äôt be right. Eddie just kissed Buck. In front of everyone. And he liked it. Fuck. ...... ¬† Or; Buck hasn't been doing well since Bobby died. It's all he can think about... except for when he is with Eddie. Eddie's anxiety has only gotten worse. Especially when it comes to Buck. He wants, maybe even needs, to be around him. And when a fire leads to an accidental first kiss which leads too... Buck and Eddie will realize its better to speak then to die.

entry.title: You‚Äôre the Sun to Me
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,684Chapters: 19/20Kudos: 205

Summary: ‚ÄúSpeaking of‚Ä¶you got any idea what this lunch is about? She was pretty vague when she called.‚Äù Buck paused, then he shook his head, a small frown pulling between his brows. ‚ÄúNope. Not a clue.‚Äù ‚ÄúBut you‚Äôre worried,‚Äù Eddie guessed. Buck gave a half-shrug, trying for casual, though his hand lingered at Tori‚Äôs side like the contact grounded him. ‚ÄúMaddie doesn‚Äôt usually do vague. If she says she wants to talk, she wants to talk.‚Äù Tori let out a babble just then, saving him from saying more. Buck leaned down, pressing a kiss to the top of her head before scooping her into his arms. ‚ÄúGuess we‚Äôll find out soon enough.‚Äù Eddie studied him for a moment. Buck‚Äôs answering smile was soft but a little distracted, like his mind was already skipping ahead to lunch. And Eddie couldn‚Äôt shake the feeling that Maddie‚Äôs words would upend the equilibrium they‚Äôd worked so hard to hold. Or, After years of chaos, they‚Äôve built a life full of love and family, but a hidden secret from Buck‚Äôs past threatens their fragile peace. When the past collides with the present, even the happiest home feels uncertain.

entry.title: Welcome to Brooklyn
entry.summary:
Author: Bibbitybobbity

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,241Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Following a concerning plummet in firefighters and increase in reports, station 118 and their families choose to make the hard but money winning choice to uproot their lives to Brooklyn to help combat these problems. It is there they meet the 99th precinct, made up of quite a few oddities and Eddie Diaz‚Äòs cousin. They also happen to contain their own Bad luck Buck, and therefore, also end up in the most dangerous and interesting situations. (There‚Äôs no specific basis of when this is based around for each show. Only really before Jake and Amy have a wedding in the B99 universe, and before any of the major disasters in season 2. Ravi is here just because I love him) Most of the disasters in 9-1-1 and B99 will come into this and there will be some added and maybe some taken away, and some added on from smaller issues (Depends on how important they are.

entry.title: i've changed every part of me (until the puzzle pieces aren't me at all)
entry.summary:
Author: alwaysou28

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,395Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 105

Summary: Buck was fine. He really, really was, and he really, really wished everyone would stop fucking asking how he was because he was fine. Two weeks out from Jee‚Äôs birth and the bombshell of his dead brother, and Buck was fine. His body wasn‚Äôt his. Sure, it was his in the sense that it was his body, but it wasn‚Äôt his. It was Daniel‚Äôs. It was always supposed to be Daniel‚Äôs and now he didn‚Äôt know how to live in this body that was his but wasn‚Äôt. OR The fallout from learning about Daniel.

entry.title: The Space Between Us (Is Killing Me)
entry.summary:
Author: HourglassDiaz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,054Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 45

Summary: Ever since Buck moved out and Ravi helped him settle into his new house, Eddie‚Äôs been spiraling. He‚Äôs not used to the distance. Not from Buck. Not after El Paso, not after the FaceTimes and late-night calls and soft words that felt like something more. Now Buck‚Äôs spending all his time with Ravi‚Äîat work, on weekends, at home. And Eddie is left with Hen and half-finished thoughts. When Eddie shows up uninvited at Buck‚Äôs new place and finds Ravi there, too‚Äîbarefoot and too familiar‚Äîit all explodes. The jealousy, the grief, the confusion. Buck was his. Or at least he thought so. A slow unraveling of two idiots in love, told through tension, late-night arguments, Ravi‚Äôs raised eyebrows, and Chris‚Äôs knowing sighs. OR Eddie's jealousy finally reaches the boiling point and explodes, and he confronts Buck about it and they do their classic dumbassery about it.. until they don‚Äôt.

entry.title: It's Just a Number (It's Not Just a Number)
entry.summary:
Author: Bubblezzx88

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 125,780Chapters: 9/14Kudos: 167

Summary: ‚ÄúFirst, you pack up at the house and don‚Äôt tell me, and now you just sneak in here and hope no one sees you?‚Äù Eddie asked, hurt. Buck felt himself tense up at the pain he caused his best friend.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs tragic, isn‚Äôt it? I can‚Äôt even face the people who matter to me,‚Äù Buck told him. He turned to look at Eddie.Eddie was leaning against the door frame, and Ravi started to walk out. ‚ÄúNo, you stay,‚Äù Eddie said sternly as he looked at Ravi.Ravi looked between them and didn‚Äôt know what to do. He leaned back against the locker. Buck let out a frustrated sigh. ‚ÄúWhat, now?‚Äù Buck asked angrily.‚ÄúYou think that no one wants to say goodbye? You just left the group chat like it was nothing. You gave your transfer request to the interim Captain after Gerrard left, like it was nothing. No one knows how to talk to you, Buck. You just cut everyone off.‚Äù Eddie said. But Buck didn‚Äôt cut everyone off, no, he just started talking less, he just hoped no one noticed, but of course Eddie did. Eddie always noticed when Buck self-isolated.Or, what happens when Buck moves out, leaves the 118, and ghosts Eddie Diaz?

entry.title: At every table, I'll save you a seat.
entry.summary:
Author: Buddieforever1111

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,412Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: When you sit next to someone in life, whether it's in class or at your favorite bar, you know the person next to you is someone you trust. You don‚Äôt sit next to strangers you just met; you sit across from them as you try to get to know them. But when you allow someone to sit next to you, you're trusting them not to put anything in your drink or cheat on a test.¬†Maybe this isn‚Äôt always the case in everyone else‚Äôs lives, but it was the case when it came to Buck and Eddie.¬† Or... A 5 in 1, where 5 times Buck saves a seat for Eddie, and the one time, Eddie saves one for Buck.

entry.title: wanna be a boy
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,070Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 259

Summary: ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt want to be my girlfriend.‚Äù ‚ÄúI already said that.‚Äù ‚ÄúBut you want to be my‚Äîmy something else?‚Äù Eddie‚Äôs breath catches. Her eyes fly open, stinging and damp. She doesn‚Äôt answer. Her throat constricts, trapping breath inside, trapping a response inside. Silently, she prays to a god she‚Äôs not sure she believes in that the floor will open up and swallow her whole. She can‚Äôt hear him say what she thinks he‚Äôs about to say; she can‚Äôt hear it, not even once. She can‚Äôt come back from that. She just‚Äîshe can‚Äôt. Buck pushes on, hesitant. ‚Äú...My boyfriend?‚Äù OR Eddie doesn‚Äôt know how to be the man his heart yearns to be. Buck waits for him to learn.

entry.title: Sunday plans
entry.summary:
Author: queerlovefrog

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,978Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: Eddie knows that people love to take the name of god, a symbol of hope and compassion, as an excuse for blatant hate on whoever doesn't fit in. He knows that as a Mexican, as someone with a mental illness, as a father of a disabled kid, and as a queer questioning human being. Or: Buck wonders what Eddie does on Sundays. What do church, being queer, and being a firefighter have in common?
